DOC.brief_summary: A previous study has shown that tropisetron inhibits the analgesic effect of paracetamol in healthy volunteers. This study aims at confirming this pharmacodynamic interaction in patients with post-surgery pain.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Confirmation of a Pharmacodynamic Interaction Between Tropisetron and Paracetamol
DOC.detailed_description: The study is a comparison of the analgesic action of paracetamol versus tropisetron + paracetamol in 30 patients who had surgery of the ear. The evaluation criteria will be the score on the visual analogue scale for pain evaluation.
DOC.criteria: More than 18 years Men or women Ear surgery Written consent given Paracetamol hypersensibility Tropisetron hypersensibility
DOC.keyword: Patients with postsurgical pain, after ear surgery
